page.title: Grant Writer
page.intro: Prepare proposals for submission to potential funding sources to obtain funds for ongoing or special GPCFB projects.

excerpt.short: Email your cover letter and resume to careers@pittsburghfoodbank.org, fax to 412-460-0418 (Attn: Human Resources), or mail them to Human Resources, Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank, 1 N Linden St., Duquesne, PA 15110. The Food Bank is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
